column4: hey....any of you upgrade to gutsy AND are an avid user of automatix?   last few times i upgraded to new ubuntu distros everything got screwed up and someone told me its because of automatix
any chance I can reverse the damage of automatix?   i like automatix because it does a lot of work for me when i setup a new system
should be able to just remove the stuff it installs using it, then uninstall it...
